definition: Identifier of the sample
Sequencing method used
source: GSC MIxS/MIGS Bacteria ( https://genomicsstandardsconsortium.github.io/mixs/MIGSBacteria/ ), ENA Metadata Validation: Instrument ( ENA Metadata Validation: Instrument )

definition: Specify whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads
examples: e.g. single-end, paired end or others

definition: The lib_source specifies the type of source material that is being sequenced
Sequencing technique intended for this library
Whether any method was used to select and/or enrich the material being sequenced
Number of reads in the library (sequencing depth) or  spots
Number of base pairs (nucleotides) in the library or  bases
As basepairs_count divided by sequence_count
Number of reads in the library (sequencing depth) after quality filtering
Number of base pairs (nucleotides) in the library after quality filtering
Hash value for data integrity
definition
Accessions/identifiers linking to the raw data (FASTQ)
The phylogenetic marker(s) used to assign an organism name to the SAG or MAG
examples: e.g. 16s rRNA gene, multi-marker approach, other

definition: Assembly quality category
Tool(s) used, version and parameters
examples: e.g. metaSPAdes (3.11.0);kmer set 21,33,55,77,99,121, default parameters otherwise

definition: The estimated depth of sequencing coverage (in x)
Total number of contigs
source: GSC MIxS/MIGS Bacteria ( https://genomicsstandardsconsortium.github.io/mixs/MIGSBacteria/ ), Roadmap for naming uncultivated Archaea and Bacteria (Murray et al. 2020)

definition: The length of the shortest contig representing half of the assembly length
source: Roadmap for naming uncultivated Archaea and Bacteria (https://doi.org/10.1038/s41564-020-0733-x)

definition: Detection of the 23S rRNA (BA) or 5.8S/28S rRNA (E)
Tools for LSU extraction
Detection of the 16S rRNA (BA) or 18S rRNA (E)
Tools for SSU extraction
Total number of tRNAs identified from the MAG
source: https://genomicsstandardsconsortium.github.io/mixs/MIMAG/ ( https://genomicsstandardsconsortium.github.io/mixs/MIMAG/ ), Roadmap for naming uncultivated Archaea and Bacteria (Murray et al. 2020)

definition: Tools used for tRNA identification
Completeness score
Tools used for completion estimate
Contamination score
Tool(s) used in contamination screening
